General.Name: Teka Tecelagem Kuehnrich S.A
General.Description: Teka Tecelagem Kuehnrich S.A. engages in textiles business. It offers beds, tables, and bath articles. The company was founded in 1926 and is headquartered in Blumenau, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Paulo Kuehnrich, 68, Blumenau, SC, Brazil, 89052-900
